alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Judith Basin; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 21 at 2:40AM MST until February 23 at 3:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Storm Warning, additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Cascade, Judith Basin, Meagher and Central and Southern Lewis and Clark Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 11 AM this morning to 3 PM MST Wednesday. For the Winter Storm Warning, until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Cascade; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Judith Basin; Meagher
